name: Dependent Type (patient)
xml:
<field
	type="list"
	name="dependent_type"
	label="Dependent Type"
	description="The Type of dependent."
	class="list_class"
	layout="joomla.form.field.list-fancy-select"
	multiple="true"
	option="none|None,child|Child,stepchild|Stepchild,foster_child|Foster Child,adopted_child|Adopted Child,spouse|Spouse,partner|Partner,parent|Parent,stepparent|Stepparent,guardian|Guardian,sibling|Sibling,grandparent|Grandparent,grandchild|Grandchild,aunt_uncle|Aunt / Uncle,niece_nephew|Niece / Nephew,cousin|Cousin,in_law|In-law,caregiver|Caregiver,domestic_worker|Domestic Worker,sponsor|Sponsor / Benefactor,other_relative|Other Relative,other_non_relative|Other Non-Relative"
/>
